Docstring for module_arguments.

Examples 

[outa, outb] = module_arguments(1, 2, "withdefault", "foo", "nodefault", 'bar');

Input arguments:

Name Type Description Default
required double

Required parameter

required
optional double

Optional parameter

required
varargin

Repeating input parameter

required

Name-value arguments:

Name Type Description Default
withdefault string

name value pair with default value

"withdefault"
nodefault char

name value pair without default value

Output arguments:

Name Type Description
outa double

Output parameter

outb double

Another output parameter
